actions.in_committee: House Committee on Transportation and Infrastructure
actions.text: Referred to the Subcommittee on Coast Guard and Maritime Transportation.

committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Coast Guard and Maritime Transportation

official_title: To authorize certain operations of Canadian oil spill response and recovery vessels in waters of the United States.
subjects: Oil pollution of rivers, harbors, etc.

summary.text: Authorizes Canadian oil spill response and recovery vessels to operate in U.S. waters for the purpose of recovering, transporting, and unloading in a U.S. port oil discharged (or threatened to be discharged) in such waters, if the Federal On-Scene Coordinator determines that not enough U.S.-documented response and recovery vessels can be engaged in a timely manner.

titles.title: To authorize certain operations of Canadian oil spill response and recovery vessels in waters of the United States.
